Author: skyward007
Title: [ANN][ICO] Wemark - The Blockchain-based Marketplace for Digital Content
Body: Update from Wemark CEO:  We apologize for the delay in publishing the sale wrap-up. Just before releasing the final numbers we have learned about a legal requirement that might affect a small number of our private sale contributions. As unsold tokens will be burned, we have to report the final and exact data. We are close to fully sort this issue and I believe that we'll post the wrap-up by Wednesday next week, if not before.  As we said before, we will release the tokens and enable transactions on the marketplace regardless of the market conditions, and it's closer than ever. There is plenty of work behind the scenes to make sure we're prepared to get users and make an impact on the industry right from the first year, and most of this work will become public over the next couple of months.  As I briefly mentioned before, a lot of work is being done on the content review side as well. Starting very soon, selected photographers (professionals only, for now) will get an FTP access and after their portfolio is reviewed, they will be able to submit images to the marketplace directly. Those images will be reviewed differently than the rest of the submitted content. This will allow trusted photographers to onboard their content without waiting like everyone else. At the same time, we're also checking the option of outsourcing some part of the review process to external content review teams to accelerate and improve this important part of our platform.  I hope this helps to shed some light over what's going on. Needless to say we all work extremely hard to complete these big plans and make them public.  Happy to answer any questions, even if I'm a little slow in response I'm always here and very interested in what you guys have to say.  Have a great weekend (what's left of it) and thanks for your continued support!

Author: dhendrickk
Title: [ANN][ICO] Wemark - The Blockchain-based Marketplace for Digital Content
Body: Hello there! WemarkIs a P2P marketplace that creates a distributed alternative to Shutterstock and Getty Images, who lead the super-centralized $4b stock photo market and take up to 85% (!) in transaction fees.  Wemark is  using the blockchain to enable direct photo licensing to customers and full transparency for photographers. The immediate advantages are alignment of interests, full control over distributed content, and a disruptive lifetime fee of only 15%.  Wemark is leveraging this advantage to onboard the top contributing photographers of Shutterstock and Getty Images. With the help of the former Director of Content at Shutterstock, which is very active on our Advisory Board.Wemark also partnered with Viewbug and Caia. Wemark is  planning to launch Wemark Images with such amount of quality images that will make the process of bringing the demand side much easier.   You can get more information about the team here - https://www.wemark.com/about

After a very extensive research Wemark has done when making the decision to offer 85%, Wemark realized it's just not sustainable to charge 5%. Photographers will be happy to join either if they're paying 5% or 15%, but they will expect to get meaningful sales. Based on many industry experts, including Wemark’s advisors, 5% will not be enough to maintain a working marketplace, while investing on marketing and business development, and still building a business that makes sense financially. There's a right balance between how much creators get and how much goes for distribution. Author: Ruthenian
Title: [ANN][ICO] Wemark - The Blockchain-based Marketplace for Digital Content
Body: As their first use-case, Wemark Tokens will be used to license and access photos on Wemark’s marketplace (wemark.com). As all the transactions on Wemark.com will be done through the Wemark protocol, licensing photos on the marketplace will require the use of Wemark Tokens. The tokens will enable direct transactions between photographers and customers, while using Wemark’s protocol to reward Wemark for distributing the photo and other parties that helped to promote the content (referrals) if applicable.  Our vision is a dedicated token to enable creators to get paid directly from customers and pay for all the services related to creating, protecting and distributing their content. For example, photographers will be able to hire models, buy equipment, and even pay for legal services (if and when needed) using WMK.  Another step in the economy’s evolution is to enable fractional (or partial) ownership of content. This means that creators will be able to “tokenize” their content and share its ownership with other parties. Creators will be able to give a fraction of the ownership over their content (includ- ing future revenue) for those who helped creating it (models, actors, editors, etc.) or for inves- tors and early supporters in the form of crowdfunding.  Wemark will work continuously to develop new ways for the tokens to be used - within and outside the limits of the protocol and Wemark’s products. More use cases are likely to be announced (and added to this White Paper) before the TGE, and frequently after it ends.
